data.title: Principal Engineer at SPECTRUM
data.meta_description: Learn more about applying for Principal Engineer at SPECTRUM
data.text:
Speaker 1: This is Spectrum. A wide range of ideas, a broad scope of solutions, ideas that inspire innovation and advanced technology. Solutions, like delivering superior products and service to more than 32 million customers in 41 States.

Spectrum is connecting more people to fast, reliable internet and wifi, providing crystal clear HDTV and expanding our voice capabilities to include mobile phone service, to meet the demand for a better wireless experience.

Our drive to deliver superior service goes far beyond the home. Spectrum provides powerful network support and advertising solutions to help businesses, large and small, reach their goals. We're in your neighborhoods, covering the local stories and events with exclusive 24/7 news and sports programming. We have 93,000 well-trained dedicated employees.

From military veterans, to those just entering the workforce, to a new generation of pioneers and creators. Spectrum offers dynamic career opportunities to a diverse range of talent.

Our dependable 750,000 mile network is fueling new ideas, energizing new endeavors, and empowering our customers to achieve their full potential. This wide range of ideas, this broad scope of solutions, this is Spectrum.
